The '''Amethyst Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]].

All weapons in this series can be [[Forging|forged]]. Forging these weapons notably require {{Item|Northlander Billet Trove|link=Northlander Billet|text=Northlander Billets|30}} and {{Item|Amethyst Lump|text=Amethyst Lumps|30}}, among other materials.

Only [[Kitain Cross Spear]] and [[Katsuragikiri Nagamasa]] share the same passive.
